languages.text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It represents knowledge of the alien species known to the Imperium, the threat they pose, and their general appearance. May give access to new dialogue options.
Also can be used to disable traps of xenos origin.
languages.original_text:
Этот навык зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g}.
Отражает знания об инопланетных видах, известных Империуму: об их внешнем виде и угрозе, которую они представляют. Может дать доступ к новым репликам в диалогах.
Этот навык также может быть использован для обезвреживания ловушек ксеносского происхождения.

traits.locale_text:
This skill depends on Intelligence characteristic.
It represents knowledge of alien species known to the Imperium, the threat they pose, and their general appearance. May give access to new dialogue options.
Also can be used to disable traps of xenos origin.

This skill depends on Intelligence characteristic.
It represents knowledge of alien species known to the Imperium, the threat they pose, and their general appearance. May give access to new dialogue options.
Also can be used to disable traps of xenos origin.

It represents knowledge of the alien species known to the Imperium, the threat they pose, and their general appearance. May give access to new dialogue options.
Also can be used to disable traps of xenos origin.

It represents knowledge of the alien species known to the Imperium, the threat they pose, and their general appearance. May give access to new dialogue options.

This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It represents knowledge of the alien species known to the Imperium, the threat they pose, and their general appearance. May give access to new dialogue options.

languages.text:
Diese Fertigkeit wird durch die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaft{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} beeinflusst.
Sie steht für die Kenntnis der dem Imperium bekannten außerirdischen Spezies, der Bedrohung, die sie für die Menschheit darstellen, und ihres allgemeinen Erscheinungsbildes. Kann Zugang zu neuen Dialogoptionen ermöglichen.
Kann auch verwendet werden, um von den Xenos stammende Fallen zu deaktivieren.
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It represents knowledge of the alien species known to the Imperium, the threat they pose, and their general appearance. May give access to new dialogue options.
Also can be used to disable traps of xenos origin.

traits.locale_text:
Diese Fertigkeit wird durch die Eigenschaft Intelligenz beeinflusst.
Sie steht für die Kenntnis der dem Imperium bekannten außerirdischen Spezies, der Bedrohung, die sie für die Menschheit darstellen, und ihres allgemeinen Erscheinungsbildes. Kann Zugang zu neuen Dialogoptionen ermöglichen.
Kann auch verwendet werden, um von den Xenos stammende Fallen zu deaktivieren.

languages.text:
Cette compétence repose sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
Elle mesure la connaissance qu'a un personnage des espèces extraterrestres identifiées par l'Imperium, de la menace qu'elles représentent et de leur apparence générale. Peut donner accès à de nouvelles options de dialogue.
Peut également être utilisée pour désamorcer des pièges xénos.
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It represents knowledge of the alien species known to the Imperium, the threat they pose, and their general appearance. May give access to new dialogue options.
Also can be used to disable traps of xenos origin.

traits.locale_text:
Cette compétence repose sur la caractéristique Intelligence.
Elle mesure la connaissance qu'a un personnage des espèces aliens identifiées par l'Imperium, de la menace qu'elles représentent et de leur apparence générale. Peut donner accès à de nouvelles options de dialogue.
Peut également être utilisée pour désamorcer des pièges de xénos.

languages.text:
此技能受{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}影响。
代表角色对帝国已知主要与次要外星物种的了解，清楚它们的大致外形，知道它们对人类构成的威胁。此技能可能提供新的对话选项。
此技能也可以用来拆除异形制造的陷阱。
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It represents knowledge of the alien species known to the Imperium, the threat they pose, and their general appearance. May give access to new dialogue options.
Also can be used to disable traps of xenos origin.

traits.locale_text:
此技能受智力属性影响。
代表角色对帝国已知主要与次要外星物种的了解，清楚它们的大致外形，知道它们对人类构成的威胁。此技能可能提供新的对话选项。
此技能也可以用来拆除异形制造的陷阱。

languages.original_text: This skill represents knowledge of the minor and major alien species known to the Imperium, the threat they pose, and their general appearance. It's also can be used to disable traps of xeno origin.

languages.text:
Esta habilidad se basa en la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} del personaje.
Representa el conocimiento de las especies alienígenas que conoce el Imperium, así como la amenaza que suponen y su aspecto general. Puede abrir nuevas opciones de diálogo.
También puede usarse para desactivar trampas de origen xenos.

También puede usarse para desactivar trampas de origen xenos.

Этот навык зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g}.
Отражает знания об инопланетных видах, известных Империуму: об их внешнем виде и угрозе, которую они представляют. Может дать доступ к новым репликам в диалогах.
Этот навык также может быть использован для обезвреживания ловушек ксеносского происхождения.

languages.text:
このスキルは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}の影響を受ける。
帝国が認知している大小の宇宙種族、それらがもたらす脅威、一般的な外見に関する知識を表す。新しいダイアログオプションにアクセスするだろう。
また、異種族の出生を無効化にする罠を使用できる。
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It represents knowledge of the alien species known to the Imperium, the threat they pose, and their general appearance. May give access to new dialogue options.
Also can be used to disable traps of xenos origin.

traits.locale_text:
このスキルは知性特性の影響を受ける。
帝国が認知している大小の宇宙種族、それらがもたらす脅威、一般的な外見に関する知識を表す。新しいダイアログオプションにアクセスするだろう。
また、異種族（ゼノ）の出生を無効化にする罠を使用できる。

languages.text:
Bu yetenek, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliğine{/g} dayalıdır.
Bir karakterin İmparatorluk tarafından bilinen uzaylı türleri, bu varlıkların oluşturduğu tehditler ve genel görünümleri hakkındaki bilgi düzeyini yansıtır. Yeni diyalog seçeneklerine erişim sağlayabilir.
Ayrıca zeno kökenli tuzakların etkisiz hâle getirilmesinde de kullanılabilir.
